text: Peter Hein (born 18 December 1943) is a German rower who represented East Germany. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City with the men's eight where they came seventh. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Anklam Category:People from the Province of Pomerania Category:German male rowers Category:Sportspeople from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Olympic rowers of East Germany Category:Rowers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for East Germany Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Peter Hein (rower)
